text: Elham Hamidi () is an Iranian actress born on June 23 1977 Tehran, Iran. She has appeared in the mini-series Prophet Joseph as Asinaat. She also starred in The Kingdom of Solomon as Mariyam. Elham Hamidi is an accounting graduate student from "Roudehen University". Elham participated in school plays from the age of seven because it is her family occupation. Her father was also an actor and he was much active in theater, this developed an interest in Elham to join this field like her father. ==References== * ==Other websites== * Category:Living people Category:Actors from Tehran Category:1977 births
title: Elham Hamidi
